page.title: 01LANDSCAPE AROUND BRYNFORD.
page.content: In our village there are lots of houses and farms. We have a park next to our football pitch. In our park we have four swings,a rounabout and a slide. We have an old school in our village it is not used for a school now,it is used for a playgroup and a youth club and jumble sales are held in the village hall. We have two shops; one is a post office which sells groceries. We also have two pubs called the Llyn y Mawn and the Crooked Horn. We also have a hospital nearby called Lluesty hospital which is an old peole's home and convalescent hospital. Most of the land around Brynford is common land where sheep graze.There are a lot of old quarries and old lead mine shafts around the village.
